info.name: Studify - Mobile Student API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Student mobile app

All endpoints require authentication with Bearer token.
Set the 'token' variable after login.

Note: Login and Profile endpoints now return 'username' field extracted from user profile (Student.name, Doctor.name, etc.).

request.description: Get all colleges (public endpoint - no authentication required). Use this to get collegeId for registration.
Get a specific college by ID (public endpoint - no authentication required).
Get all departments (public endpoint - no authentication required). Use collegeId query parameter to filter by college. Use this to get departmentId for registration.
Get a specific department by ID (public endpoint - no authentication required).
Create a CONTENT order for a book. Optional: address, latitude, longitude (customer delivery location for map/tracking).
Global endpoint: get all enabled print options for a book. :bookId = book UUID.
Global endpoint: get all enabled print options for a material. :materialId = material UUID.
Get all print options. Filter by bookId, materialId, or hasUploadedFile.
Get pricing quote for a print option. Returns total price based on the print option's configuration (copies, paperType, colorType, doubleSide).

item.name: Create Print Order from Print Option

request.description: Create an order from a print option. The print option must already exist with all configuration (copies, paperType, colorType, doubleSide).

item.name: Upload File and Create Print Option

formdata.description: Optional: Number of pages in the uploaded file

request.description: Upload a file (PDF/DOC) and create a print option. File will be uploaded and URL will be saved automatically. Returns the created print option with uploadedFileUrl.
Create a print option for a book. Book ID is in the URL path.
Create a print option for a material. Material ID is in the URL path.
Create a CONTENT order for a material. Optional: address, latitude, longitude (customer delivery location for map/tracking).
Create a PRODUCT order (cart). Optional: address, latitude, longitude (delivery location for map/tracking). For BOOK/MATERIAL use books/:bookId/access or materials/:materialId/access.
Confirm payment for an order (status CREATED → PAID). paymentMethod: CASH | CREDIT | PAYMENT_LINK (for web/gateway later). Sets paidAt and may trigger print center assignment.
